title: ‘It’s Ridiculous, a Joke’: Volta ao Algarve Stage 1 Canceled After Scores of Riders Take Wrong Turn in Final
content:
Sprint teams left fuming after scores of riders diverted down road parallel to finishing straight in Algarve: 'There needs to be consequences for the officials.'

Read the full article at ‘It’s Ridiculous, a Joke’: Volta ao Algarve Stage 1 Canceled After Scores of Riders Take Wrong Turn in Final on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
